definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The drug trafficker is concerned about the condition of the traditional concert.
sentences.chinese: 毒品販子擔心傳統音樂會的狀況。

sentences.english: We also have fitness for duty programmes, which is drug and alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 我們也適合於學習的項目，也就是毒品和酒精。

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不靜脈注射毒品這兩道防線是極其脆弱的。

sentences.english: The police have seized a great deal of drugs this time.
sentences.chinese: 警方這次搜查緝獲了大量的毒品。

sentences.english: So we'll continue to do the best we can to interdict supplies.
sentences.chinese: 並且我們會繼續盡我們所能來阻斷毒品來源。

sentences.english: Lin, J. (2016). The Problem and countermeasures of synthetic drug abuse among adolescents in Macao.
sentences.chinese: 澳門在學青少年合成毒品濫用問題及對策研究。

sentences.english: And mine boost clothes, sell 'dro, got the blow cheap.
sentences.chinese: 我搶衣服，賣毒品，能搞到便宜的可卡因。

sentences.english: The police are launching a major attack on drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 警方對毒品販子發動了大規模的攻擊。

sentences.english: Thanks for Prohibition and the war against drugs.
sentences.chinese: 感謝禁酒令和與毒品之戰。

sentences.english: He was deeply involved with the anti-drugs crusade.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地涉入了反毒品運動。

sentences.english: They were the visual signature of dope.
sentences.chinese: 他們從視覺上展現了毒品的特徵。

sentences.english: Drug dealers acquire drugs in Thailand and then mail them to Hong Kong drug addicts.
sentences.chinese: 毒販在泰國購買毒品，再寄給香港的吸毒者。

sentences.english: Say no to drugs to prevent HIV transmission by illegal drug injection.
sentences.chinese: 拒絕毒品，預防經注射吸毒傳播艾滋病。

sentences.english: Frank is concerned that he doesn’t have the money for the drug deal.
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭克感到擔心，因爲他沒有錢進行毒品交易。

sentences.english: Ambition is a drug that makes its addicts potential madmen.
sentences.chinese: 野心是一種毒品，它會使那些有瘋癲潛質的人上癮。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton said he presided over a " narco- state."
sentences.chinese: 國務卿希拉里說卡爾扎伊管理的是一個“毒品國家”。
